    for filename in filenames:
        print(os.path.join(dirname, filename))

wii_numbers = df[df['Platform'] == 'Wii']['Global_Sales'].mean()
average_global_sales = df['Global_Sales'].mean()
print(abs(wii_numbers - average_global_sales))
